chunks.zh: 有什么适合程序员吃的保健品嘛🤣
chunks.en: What health supplements are suitable for programmers? 🤣

chunks.zh:
最近感觉状态有点差：
* 睡眠质量太差，反复醒来
* 发质变得很干毛糙
* 踢球时以往的爆发力不在了
* ...也有在健身，或许我焦虑了
chunks.en:
I've been feeling a bit off lately:
* Poor sleep quality, waking up repeatedly
* Hair texture becoming very dry and rough
* No longer have the same explosiveness when playing soccer as before
* ...Also been working out, maybe I'm just anxious

chunks.zh: 程序员并不是特殊人种
chunks.en: Programmers are not a special breed.

chunks.zh: 蔬菜，水果，牛奶
chunks.en: Vegetables, fruits, milk

chunks.zh: 搜虎扑五件套。
chunks.en: Search for the Hupu five-piece set.

chunks.zh: 鱼油，复合维生素
chunks.en: Fish oil, multivitamin

chunks.zh: 1 褪黑素。2 维生素 C ，维生素 B 。3 牛肉。
chunks.en: 1 Melatonin. 2 Vitamin C, Vitamin B. 3 Beef.

chunks.zh: 睡眠质量太差，反复醒来 -> （精神压力大）-> 解压发质变得很干毛糙 -> 换个牌子的洗发水踢球时以往的爆发力不在了 -> 少吃外卖也有在健身 -> 健身更多的塑形，不是健康
chunks.en: Poor sleep quality, waking up repeatedly -> (High mental stress) -> De-stress Hair texture becoming very dry and rough -> Change the brand of shampoo No longer have the same explosiveness when playing soccer as before -> Eat less takeout Also been working out -> Working out is more for shaping, not health

chunks.zh: @zsl199512101234 和成都有什么关系🤩
chunks.en: @zsl199512101234 What does it have to do with Chengdu? 🤩

chunks.zh: 初音未来缓释片https://item.jd.com/10113709481744.html
chunks.en: Hatsune Miku sustained-release tablets https://item.jd.com/10113709481744.html

chunks.zh: @johnnyNg 四川地区日照少，我又上班不爱出门晒太阳，所以我还吃了维生素 d3
chunks.en: @johnnyNg Sichuan area has little sunshine, and I don't like going out in the sun when I go to work, so I also take vitamin D3

chunks.zh: 友情提示  睡眠差+健身 = 猝死套餐
chunks.en: Friendly reminder: Poor sleep + fitness = sudden death combo

chunks.zh: 看四本书，了解自己身体亚健康的根源。 把最有影响，损害身体的 Top3 行为禁掉。你不好好吃饭的前提下，吃维生素，属于在试错。 《吃出健康好身材》 范志红的《你是你吃出来的（慢病怎么吃）》 夏萌的《你是你吃出来的（吃对少生病）》夏萌的《冯雪科学减肥法》 冯雪的
chunks.en: Read four books to understand the root cause of your body's sub-health. Ban the Top 3 behaviors that are most influential and damaging to your body. If you don't eat properly, taking vitamins is just trial and error. "Eat Your Way to a Healthy Body" Fan Zhihong's "You Are What You Eat (How to Eat for Chronic Diseases)" Xia Meng's "You Are What You Eat (Eat Right and Get Sick Less)" Xia Meng's "Feng Xue's Scientific Weight Loss Method" Feng Xue's

chunks.zh: @JontyChen #91 南非醉茄也辅佐生成 gaba ，我是稍微加了剂量，单吃南非醉茄也行吧
chunks.en: @JontyChen #91 Ashwagandha also helps to generate GABA, I added a little dose, is it okay to eat ashwagandha alone?

chunks.zh: 你这是年纪大了
chunks.en: You're just getting old.

chunks.zh: @magewu1223ll #3 扎心了
chunks.en: @magewu1223ll #3 That hits hard.

chunks.zh: @magewu1223ll 还不致于，不到 30
chunks.en: @magewu1223ll Not yet, not even 30.

chunks.zh: 规律运行，按时作息，饮食清淡，营养均衡
chunks.en: Regular schedule, regular work and rest, light diet, balanced nutrition

chunks.zh: @xtx 细说这是什么？
chunks.en: @xtx Explain in detail what this is?

chunks.zh: 我在成都，吃京东京造的男士复合维生素+now 的维生素 d3+k2+swiss 的鱼油，每天早上各一粒
chunks.en: I'm in Chengdu, and I take one tablet each morning of JD Jingzao men's multivitamin + now vitamin d3+k2 + Swiss fish oil.

chunks.zh: @21Silva 过了 25 会有感觉身体下滑的，吃不管用了，得配合一定的运动量
chunks.en: @21Silva After 25 you will feel your body declining, eating will not work, you have to combine it with a certain amount of exercise.

chunks.zh: @xtx 葡萄糖酸锌片，维生素 C 和复合维生素 B 片...
chunks.en: @xtx Zinc gluconate tablets, Vitamin C and complex Vitamin B tablets...
